Briefcase.description: Briefcases are used by Workflows and can contain parts, documents or engineering changes.

part_ids.description: List of part IDs in this Briefcase. (teilenummer@t_index)
part_ids.title: Part Ids

document_ids.description: List of document IDs in this Briefcase. (z_nummer@z_index)
document_ids.title: Document Ids

engineering_change_ids.description: List of engineering change IDs in this Briefcase. (cdb_ec_id)
engineering_change_ids.title: Engineering Change Ids

Briefcase.title: Briefcase

Document.description: Normal Document that doesn't contain a CAD-Model.
Document.title: Document

documents.description: List of documents that will be released.
documents.title: Documents

attached_parts.description: List of parts that belong to the documents
attached_parts.title: Attached Parts

documents.description: List of documents that were released.
documents.title: Documents

parts.description: List of parts that belong to the released documents
parts.title: Parts

part_ids.description: List of part IDs, that were changed. (teilenummer@t_index)
part_ids.title: Part Ids

document_ids.description: List of document IDs, that were changed. (z_nummer@z_index)
document_ids.title: Document Ids

planned_changes_part_ids.description: List of part IDs, that were planned to be changed. (teilenummer@t_index)
planned_changes_part_ids.title: Planned Changes Part Ids

planned_changes_document_ids.description: List of document IDs, that were planned to be changed. (z_nummer@z_index)
planned_changes_document_ids.title: Planned Changes Document Ids

accompanying_document_ids.description: List of document IDs, that accompany the change. (z_nummer@z_index)
accompanying_document_ids.title: Accompanying Document Ids

engineering_changes.description: List of engineering changes that will be released.
engineering_changes.title: Engineering Changes

engineering_changes.description: List of engineering changes that were released.
engineering_changes.title: Engineering Changes

app_lang.description: ISO code of the session language that triggered the webhook.
app_lang.title: App Lang

app_user.description: User id of the user that triggered the webhook. (personalnummer)
app_user.title: App User

service_url.description: Url of the access service. None if not available.
service_url.title: Service Url

service_token.description: Token for the access service. None if not available.
service_token.title: Service Token

request_datetime.description: Time when the request was started.
request_datetime.title: Request Datetime

instance_url.description: URL to the instance where the webhook was triggered.
instance_url.title: Instance Url

db_service_url.description: URL to the DB Access Service responsible for the instance.
db_service_url.title: Db Service Url

document_ids.description: List of document IDs, that were changed. (z_nummer@z_index)
document_ids.title: Document Ids

parts.description: List of parts that will be released.
parts.title: Parts

attached_documents.description: List of documents that are referenced by the parts.
attached_documents.title: Attached Documents

parts.description: List if parts that were released.
parts.title: Parts

documents.description: List if documents that are referenced by the released part.
documents.title: Documents

started_at.description: Date when the workflow was started.
started_at.title: Started At

started_by.description: ID of the user who started the workflow.
started_by.title: Started By

workflows.description: List of workflows in this event
workflows.title: Workflows

parts.description: List if parts attached to the workflow.
parts.title: Parts

documents.description: List if documents attached to the workflow.
documents.title: Documents

engineering_changes.description: List of engineering changes attached to the workflow.
engineering_changes.title: Engineering Changes

briefcases.description: List of briefcases attached to the workflow.
briefcases.title: Briefcases
